source.title: Sheet - shadcn/ui
source.description: Official shadcn/ui Sheet quick-reference: CLI/manual installation, import statements, basic usage structure, side property options, CSS width customisation. Use for setup and minimal examples.

source.title: Shadcn Sheet (Unofficial)
source.description: Unofficial guide (shadcn.io): Extended Sheet examples including form patterns, navigation drawers, mobile action sheets, API reference tables, edge positioning use cases, production tips. Same Radix Dialog API as official.

source.title: Field - shadcn/ui
source.description: Field component system including Field, FieldSet, FieldGroup, FieldLabel, FieldContent, FieldDescription, FieldError for composing accessible forms with inputs, checkboxes, radios, switches, choice cards, responsive layouts, and validation states.

source.title: TanStack Form - shadcn/ui
source.description: TanStack Form integration with shadcn Field components, Zod schema validation, useForm hook setup, validation modes, error display, field types including input, textarea, select, checkbox, radio, switch, and array fields.

source.title: Button - shadcn/ui
source.description: Button component with variants (default, outline, ghost, destructive, secondary, link), sizes (sm, default, lg, icon, icon-sm, icon-lg), icon support, spinner loading state, asChild prop for polymorphism, and ButtonGroup composition.

source.title: Sonner - shadcn/ui
source.description: Sonner toast component installation, setup with Toaster in app layout, usage patterns, toast variants including default, success, info, warning, error, and promise-based toasts, plus changelog for lucide icon updates.

source.title: Shadcn Sonner (Unofficial)
source.description: Unofficial guide (shadcn.io): Extended Sonner toast patterns including success, error, loading states, promise integration, custom JSX content, undo actions, persistent notifications, API reference, configuration options.

source.title: MCP Server - shadcn/ui
source.description: MCP Server for AI assistants to browse, search, and install components from registries using natural language, with configuration for Claude Code, Cursor, VS Code, Codex, namespaced registries, authentication, and troubleshooting.

source.title: shadcn - shadcn/ui
source.description: CLI commands including init for project setup, add for installing components, view for previewing registry items, search and list for discovering components, and build for generating registry JSON files.

source.title: components.json - shadcn/ui
source.description: Project configuration file defining style, Tailwind CSS settings (config path, base colour, CSS variables, prefix), RSC support, TypeScript choice, path aliases for components and utils, and namespaced registry configuration.

source.title: Theming - shadcn/ui
source.description: CSS variables and utility classes theming configuration, background and foreground colour conventions, adding custom colours with @theme inline directive, and base colour palettes including neutral, stone, zinc, gray, and slate.

source.title: Empty - shadcn/ui
source.description: Empty component for displaying placeholder states with EmptyHeader, EmptyMedia, EmptyTitle, EmptyDescription, and EmptyContent subcomponents, supporting icons, avatars, backgrounds, outlines, and interactive content like buttons or inputs.

source.title: Item - shadcn/ui
source.description: Versatile flex container component for displaying content with media (icons, avatars, images), titles, descriptions, and actions. Includes variants, sizes, ItemGroup for lists, and asChild prop for link rendering.

source.title: Sidebar - shadcn/ui
source.description: SidebarProvider (state, cookies, keyboard shortcut, width), Sidebar (side, variant, collapsible modes), structural components (Header, Footer, Content, Trigger, Rail, Inset), SidebarGroup with labels/actions, SidebarMenu with MenuButton, MenuAction, MenuSub, MenuBadge, MenuSkeleton, useSidebar hook

source.title: Navigation Menu - shadcn/ui
source.description: NavigationMenu with List, Item, Trigger, Content, Link, Indicator, Viewport subcomponents. CLI/manual installation, composition structure, asChild prop for Next.js Link integration. Radix UI primitives.

source.title: Drawer - shadcn/ui
source.description: Drawer component built on Vaul library for mobile-friendly slide-up panels, with installation via CLI, usage patterns, and responsive dialog example combining Drawer on mobile with Dialog on desktop.

source.title: Shadcn Drawer (Unofficial)
source.description: Unofficial guide (shadcn.io): Extended Drawer examples covering Vaul gestures, multi-direction support, snap points, nested patterns, API reference tables, production tips, responsive dialog-drawer strategy. Same Vaul API as official.

source.title: Badge - shadcn/ui
source.description: Badge component for displaying labels and status indicators, with variants including default, secondary, destructive, and outline styles, plus asChild prop for rendering badges as links.

source.title: LLMs.txt - shadcn/ui
source.description: Complete component reference with links to official shadcn/ui documentation, organised by category (form, layout, overlay, feedback, display), plus dark mode, forms, and registry sections.

source.title: Input Group - shadcn/ui
source.description: InputGroup component for adding icons, text, buttons, tooltips, spinners, labels, and dropdowns to inputs and textareas, with InputGroupAddon alignment options, InputGroupButton variants, and custom input support via data-slot attribute.

source.title: Native Select - shadcn/ui
source.description: Styled native HTML select element with NativeSelect, NativeSelectOption, and NativeSelectOptGroup components, featuring option groups, disabled and invalid states, form integration, InputGroup compatibility, and accessibility with native browser behavior.

source.title: Spinner - shadcn/ui
source.description: Loading indicator component with customisable size and colour via Tailwind utilities, replaceable icon, usage examples with Button, Badge, Input Group, Empty, and Item components.

source.title: Registry Item JSON Schema Examples - shadcn/ui
source.description: JSON examples for registry:style, registry:theme, registry:block types. Covers cssVars, @layer CSS, @utility, @import, @plugin Tailwind, @keyframes animations, envVars, universal items.

source.title: Registry System Introduction - shadcn/ui
source.description: Overview of shadcn CLI registry for distributing components, hooks, pages, configs, and rules. Framework-agnostic system works with React, Vue, Svelte, or any project type.

source.title: Registry Setup and Build Guide - shadcn/ui
source.description: Configure registry.json, define items with files and dependencies, build with `shadcn build`, serve from public/r/. Guidelines for registryDependencies, @/registry imports, and `shadcn add` installation.
